caption: Excellent local spot in Miami
Great spot! Great staff! Great beer!
Great customer service. Great music. Okay beer.
This place did not disappoint us The bartender was very nice and had no issue letting me sample a beer before getting one. Played awesome music as well, very chill vibe that we enjoyed.
Great bar! Good selection of beers they make and some others as well, plus a full bar for those who aren't into beer so much. Friendly staff, outdoor seating, good atmosphere.

Unbelievable experience. I was there last night for 1 beer. He said “what are you having, same IPA as last night”? I said, sure. He says-“ I’ve got one more for you, Albert”! How does he remember my 1 drink with my 3 friends-AND, my name! Great experience. Great beer! Ask him to see the Joker card!
More like a Bar that brews a few beers. However the few beers that I tried were pretty good!! A little dark inside but overall nice vibe and venue.
Great Dive Bar. Juke box always playing classic rock and roll and soul. Good selection of beer. Food next door if you need it.
Best beer in Miami
Cool bar drinks are reasonable bartenders are all cool
Night time atmosphere has a very different vibe, more neighborhood bar than brewery. Good beer though
Great local establishment worth a visit any day of the week for excellent craft brews and cocktails. Never a let down here.

My bf and I came here because we really just wanted to have a beer or two. Had a little difficulty locating it at first but it's definitely a hole in the wall kind of place but those are almost always the best! Did not disappoint! The …
Been coming to the Abbey for years. Great local spot with amazing craft beer, friendly service and cocktails. You won’t miss the classic “BAR” sign.

My wife and I came here on our honeymoon and this was our favorite place in Miami Beach, hands down. We live in Fort Collins, CO, so we're a little particular about our beer. Abbey Brewing Company blew us out of the water. The beer and …

This is definitely a great place for locals and tourists alike, their selection of craft beer and drinks is amazing.  They recently renovated this place adding more space, smoking is allowed and their IPA’s or Stouts are their best.  They …

Amazing brewery in the heart of Mid-beaches. Not kid friendly, and has an amazing array of Belgium/Trappist style beers. Double and Triple were personal faves. Pool table a delightful plus. Note - very limited food menu. Very friendly establishment overall.
If I could give negative stars I would.  We're locals and we know our people and the bartenders and... We spend a lot of $$$ at the
Best IPA in Miami!  You guys still selling t-shirts?

Came here with a large group, so the tip was already included.  I think that's part of the reason why the waiter wasn't super receptive.  Even though we had a reservation for 12, we still had to wait about 25 minutes.
Wait isn't bad as it looks ! You'll be able to get a seat as soon as it's your turn . I can honestly say the best horchata ice cream I've ever tried !!!
So their crazy cocktails tend to be too citrusey (citrus is good but so much you pucker is not) but really how often can you pay $5 for someone to work that hard on your drink. It's rare.

My favorite bar of all bars in the USA that I've been too. Slightly grungy but clean and up kept. Good music and great bartenders. A full whiskey list and craft beer that helped me define my love for beer and whiskey.
Good place for a drink. Special beers a little pricey though.
Not only do they have great beer, but the best selection of bourbon that I've seen on south beach. A must stop
Small place but fantastic craft brews.  Trappist and Belgium style house made.  Absolutely fantastic.
Just went by there it's closed down
Very nice atmosphere with interesting types of beer ... my favorite strawberry beer
Great hole in the wall pit stop. Excellent bartenders and a good ice cold craft beer selection.

The Abbey is truly Miami's most legendary bar. This place never disappoints and is never dull. Brought friends here from out of town and The Abbey made them feel like home. Best beers, best liquor selection and best spot on South Beach. We …
An amazing staff and delicious beer.

Had the Abbey Brewing house Imperial Stout, it was pretty good. However the place is so dimly lit you had to use the light from the TV or POS machine to read the menu. Unlike most of the crazy pretentious bars in the area, this was definitely a down home hole in wall joint, complete with darts and digital jukebox.
Good beers & so is the staff! Very welcoming place
Californian wheat beer is a great one!
Great little spot for craft beers.  The local ones are pretty good,  friendly staff,  and close to other attractions
Chill low key pub type bar. Friendly staff. Chill crowd.
Best selection of craft beer I found on South Beach! Friendly and helpful staff.
Not exactly what I was expecting. Feels less like a brewery and more like a dive bar.

Lively brewery with tasty beer and friendly bar staff. Beers are around $8 each. I just arrived so I don't know if that is good or bad in South Beach but I'm guessing it's reasonable here. I'd recommend a visit.
This location is one of my favorites. I'll return with my relatives.

This place is very unexpected for South Beach. Dark interior, legit great beer that's not meant for sipping pool side. Our bartender was hilarious and we got to meet the brew master who might love beer more than anyone else I know... and I'm an Untappd junky.
Anyone visiting Miami from the UK should come and visit this place. Home away from home

I really liked this place because, after hours on the baking hot beach, we were in search of cool comfort. Coming from South Beach, you see a tiny strip mall, and think about turning around to go elsewhere, but once you're inside, you feel …
Amazing owned and not beer options. IPA and Quadrupel are amazing. You can bring food in.
Love it!😍🇦🇹🍭

Came in since I was in the location and also saw they had Belgian-style beers.This location is certainly a dive, however in a few of the ideal ways. When I walked in bench was packed, but there was a great deal of open tables. One of the …
GREAT WHEAT BEER. NOT FOUND ANY PLACE BUT HERE.
Tasty brews, good service. We will come back definitely
Cool place for a brew. It's an oasis in a desert of house and hip-hop music.
Beers were delicious, but no food menu. You can bring food in.
A GREAT bar with an awesome choice of craft beer. A good choice for beating Jet Lag.
Walked in and walked out. Not for us non smokers.  Not a craft brew place if you are into craft breweries
Smoke filled bar. Good drinks, but you can't breath and you'll leave smelling like an ashtray.
Great little local brewery. If you want to go where the locals go this is the place
You want good Stout or Trappist beer while in South Beach? Come to this little bar.
Wonderful spot, kinda low key if your not from here lol
If you like beer this is a good place to go.
Smoke filled bar with friendly service and a great New England style IPA. Cultures will get crossed, try to educate those coming from non-tipping, personal space affording places, etc.

Came in because I was in the area and saw they had Belgian-style beers.  This place is definitely a dive, but in some of the best ways. When I walked in the bar was packed, but there was a lot of open tables. One of the guys at the bar, who …
Great ambient, good beer!
Good Belgian selection
Wonderful wonderful house brews. Great spirits selection and guest beer selection. Awesome decor and wonderful service.
Great locally brewed beers available here. Grab a flight or a pint and enjoy the pub style atmosphere in this cozy bar. Full liquor bar and other domestic and import beers available.
Great beers, great south beach vibe and very cool staff...bartender Crane was very beer - savvy with recommendations...highly recommended in Miami beach.
awesome place and awesome beers... drinked everything they had and my favorite was the triple hop !!!! .....little far from beach but worth the walk !!!
Great beer. Local flavor.
Love the place.  Would have loved to see the World Cup games in the AM as well. At least open at 11am - people do drink then as well.
What a great bar. Best beer, the bartenders  crane and Dan were phenomenal. Had a great time. Wish I was in Miami beach for a longer time so I could keep going back.
Great service, delicious beer, board games and darts!  Plus you can smoke inside (and yet the place doesn't smell bad).
Amazing beer! Tried all! Couldn’t be more satisfied!
Excelent bar, loved

For what I remember, this wooden little hole in the wall type of Flemish style kafé boasts even better crafted beers than 10 yrs ago.. Immaculate IPA and their Quadrupel are just right on style and so well representing them. This place is …
Happy to find this place. Stopped in for a quick flight of beers. All very well crafted and balanced. I would go back.
Went there for darts and drinks. Smelled like an ashtray. Left immediately.
Amazing. Go here. Drink beer. Enjoy. This place is Great. Old school beer.
Awesome local beer
Friendly staff in a low-key setting with affordable prices.
Always great
Such an awesome experience! Great Friendly Staff with Amazing Craft Beers. Sights & Sounds and Classic! Can't wait to do it AGAIN 😃

(Translated by Google) Excellent beer. A little off the beaten path but those who like beer are worth the 20 min walk from collins avenue.  (Original) Ottima birra.Posto un pò fuori mano ma a chi piace la birra vale la pena 20 min a piedi da collins avenue.

Truly great beer. And good whiskey. Yamikaze 18! Few places carry this! Cherry wood aged Belgian ales! Great flavors. If you like original Belgians, get the triple. Quad and double are malty. Some may like but not if you like the original belgian style. Open till 5am. Can't go wrong, besides no food served here.
Fun "dive" with great beers and liquor selection.
If only they had a kitchen, with a small menu, would be perfect...they only have peanuts, pringles and cheese combos. Excellent craft beer....
Every time I have come here the service has been great. One of the best bars in south Florida. 👌🏼
Really nice beers selection. They have beers from Quebec (Dieu du ciel). Service is perfect. No food, only some crackers.

The Abbey Brewing Co. lives up to its name. It's a great craft beer bar making their own brew in a Belgian style with many more in bottles. They also have a fully stocked bar with a good mix of Irish whiskeys, Scotch, and American bourbon …
Haven't been here for twenty years before this visit.  Still a great place to visit

(Translated by Google) One of the best bars in Miami if you like craft beers and a friendly atmosphere.  (Original) Uno de los mejores bares de Miami si te gustan las cervezas artesanales y un ambiente de amigos.
Awesome place and great beer!
Amazing place , great staff , great time !
Great people, prices and service
Love it!  best drinks , great prices, amazing staff.
Punters smoking indoors. It's not the 90s, despite the decor's protests. Beer's pretty good though.
(Translated by Google) I went to lab1: 20 am and there was nobody  (Original) Fui a lab1:20 am y no había nadie
beers weren't anything special and it was way too dark and the bartender was smoking in the bar.
Rude bartenders! Ok establishment!! I'll go somewhere else for a good American beer!! Thank you
(Translated by Google) Very good choice of beer. A must in Miami for all beer lovers.  (Original) Très bon choix de bière. Un passage obligé à Miami pour tous les amateurs de bière.
A great bar with tasty beers, although Ray the owner exaggerated the sink hole incident. He knows what I am talking about. Cheers
Cool local laid back bar with good house and guest beers plus liquor. Looks and has the feel of an old school bar

(Translated by Google) Good craft beers, unfortunately little choice. A little dark and little Miami Beach style place but still worth a visit to have a good beer.  (Original) Buone birre artigianali, purtroppo poca scelta. Posto un po' buio e poco in stile Miami Beach ma comunque merita una visita per bere una buona birra.
Good service, great beer selection. Dark and cozy
Great dive in South Beach.
Nice small place with a relaxed environment and great ambiance.

Ducked in for their Anniversary party and it was a fine time, here's why: * Friendly crowd * Excellent service * Full liquor * Brewery too * Roasted pork out back for the party * Lighting by Farrey's Lighting and Bath!  So, this was my first visit, you know I will be back!  Cabeza OUT!
Has real darts.  Bald guy is cool.
Best Moscow Mules!
Whiskey selection is good. Beer selection is way below for a place called a brewing company. Also, smoking inside? Didn't see any ashtrays, but definitely smelled like that inside.

(Translated by Google) Local craft. But the atmosphere and service are not so hot. There are 10 types of draft. The price tag is expensive even for seasoned ones. But worth a visit  (Original) Местный крафт. Но атмосфера и обслуживание не ахти. Есть видов 10 разливного. Ценник дорогой даже для видавших виды. Но посетить стоит
Amazing draft beer, amazing place, but still with normally prices! My favorite bar in Mia!

This is a beer drinker's paradise.  The bartenders are extremely knowledgeable and the beer selection is incredible with interesting and rare beers.  It has a great, easygoing feel and is a favorite for all of my friends who live on South Beach.
This is my favorite spot to go and hang out with friends. I love to go and play darts there. This place is super chill and a south beach gem!
Great beer, cozy atmosphere, and amazing service. Plus cocktails -- we didn't try them but they looked like good ones and it's nice to have the option.
LOVE THIS PLACE! Get the Apricot beer!
(Translated by Google) Exquisite place, with excellent beers at a suitable price. Highly recommended.  (Original) Exquisita lugar, con excelentes cervezas a un precio adecuado. Muy recomendable.
Try the special of the house - ask the bartender. Nice dive atmosphere, with a curious mitteleuropean touch. Cool crowd.
Speakeasy atmosphere.....good beer and good cocktails
Great beer, friendly service, what more can you ask for?

Horrible Christmas experience here. After work I stopped in looking for a bite to eat while watching the Steelers game. Unfortunately, the bar didn't have a food menu. However, they had hotdogs for customers who brought a drink. Being under …
I like local businesses and this seems to be one. Great beer and friendly staff.
I love this place.

(Translated by Google) I'm homebrewer and the 3 abbey beers I tried were excellent! The place is very dreary, typical of the Belgian theme. Prices commensurate with the sector. I would definitely go again  (Original) Soy homebrewer y las 3 …
Really laid back atmosfear! Great beer!!

Beer and food was awesome. Large drink selection.  All of the house beers we tried were great! It was a short walk from the beach, less than a mile.  There was free hot dogs and potato chips when we went.  The hot dogs were cooked in the …
Great diverse beer selection and comfortable seating. Bartender was great. Also with authentic pub atmosphere.

Really good beers I was truly impressed. I would have never thought that there would be beer like this in Miami. It is kind of hard to spot if you don't know where it is though, I drove right by it the first time.
The beers are fantastic, especially the IPA and Stout.  They're not cheap but worth a try.
Great bartenders and great hot dogs on a sunday afternoon.
Arrogance at its finest, good local beer though
Fantastic beer and atmosphere. The Father Theodore's Stout is my personal favorite, but every beer I had from them was wonderful

Great abbey style beers at this place! Two reasons why it doesn't get 5 stars from me: it's a very dimly lit venue. I found it impossible to read the beer menu without extra light from my phone. Secondly there is no foodservice. Might be a …
Laid back and once and cozy. The type of place you would go to have a dim lit conversation and a nice drink
A laid back dark place :) tried their flight taste. All beer was good. Taste like an abbey!
A great gem in Miami! Try everything!
nice lil brewery!
Good bartender, great selection... bit pricey but worth it.
Great beers. Free hot dogs on Sunday. Good but pricy old school cocktails
great beer!
They just rolled out craft cocktails onto the menu - adding intrigue to an already great bar. Tasty brews made by the owner and a dimly lit, nicely designed space

(Translated by Google) I got to go there a couple of times 10 they have excellent draft beer of very different qualities it is nice the environment to visit at large  (Original) Ho avuto modo di andarci un paio di volte 10 hanno ottima birra alla spina di diversissime qualità è carino l'ambiente da visitare alla grande
Great beer! Great staff! Great atmosphere! Darts!
A laid back dark spot with good beer offerings. Thier own brews are solid. Bar staff was friendly. Bottle pricing was a bit high. Biggest downside was the indoor smoking.
Great atmosphere! The staff is awesome! Immaculate IPA is delicious!'
Beer was great and can't beat the selection. Little dark (low lights) for my liking, but nothing really to fuss about. Staff was friendly. Nice chill place.
Awesome IPA and stouts - friendly staff.  Totally recommended!
Best beers I found in SoBe.
(Translated by Google) Setting ten points, variety of regular beers  (Original) AmbIentación diez puntos, variedad de cervezas regular
Amazing beer. They don't sell it anywhere else! Very attentive staff.  Local brewpub with real charm. Must visit if you like craft Belgian style beer.
A great craft beer spot in the craft beer desert of South Beach.
One of the first South Florida craft beer brewers. Excellent Belgian style beers. Quaint, classic pub interior. Close walking distance from Lincoln road.
Great Moscow mule!
Good beers and nice people but guys...smoking inside..disgusting!!
Great beer. Gerson the bartender is awesome.
Awesome. If you love beer come here.
Great craft brew and wiskey bar! Highly recommended if you're looking for good IPA selection and tasty whiskey Friendly staff, great service
Wow! What a find! Amazing house brewed ales and an atmosphere impossible to find in South Florida!

Kind of costly, but worth the time n money. Great crowd, n bring your dinner in with you. They won't mind. However, finger food is available. There are also free hotdogs on Sundays. Leave your pretentious, snobby -Miami- attitude at the …

A must do if you like good beer!!! Its a great place, beer was excellent. Recommend the flight of their in house draft beers, a brilliant way to try them all! Staff were attentive and very friendly. As for food we were recommended a very …
Great brews!
its a nice brewery very laid back people out their
Great atmosphere. Great beers. I recommend their house IPA! Which is brewed in Florida. If you like laid back places and great beer with cool people, don't miss this pace!
Hard to find but worth the search.  Tremendous selection of beer.  They make 4 of their own Belgian Ales that are sure to please.  Prices are very fair, a bargain for Miami Beach.  Great bartenders.
Found the place by chance and saw the reviews after getting my drink. This place deserves all the props it gets. Fantastic little place.

The Abbey is a classic. One of the only places on Miami Beach where you can enjoy a locally-brewed beer, an authentic ambience and good music. Great place to grab a drink if you're looking to hang out and meet some cool people.
Good selection, friendly knowledgeable staff, love the dive bar feel of it. No food available but you can order and have it delivered from anywhere or bring your own.
Don't be fooled by the mainstreet location of Zeke's or the daub facade, this establishment is a gem of Miami Beach
